value.title: Get data in Power BI
value.excerpt: You will learn how to retrieve data from a wide variety of data sources, including Microsoft Excel, relational databases, and NoSQL data stores. You will also learn how to improve performance while retrieving data.

value.title: Explore what Power BI can do for you
value.excerpt: As a consumer, you'll work in the Power BI service to review and interact with content that has been shared with you. This module provides the foundational information that you need to work effectively in the Power BI service.

value.title: Automatic refresh in Power BI desktop - Power BI desktop update October 2019
value.excerpt: In the october power bi desktop update, they released the possibility to have automatic page refresh for direct queries in power bi desktop and the service too.  Here we go through how it works and what you need to watch out for.  Link to the docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/desktop-automatic-page-refresh

value.title: Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration

value.title: Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium
value.excerpt: In this video, Christian Wade joined Adam Saxton to discuss Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium. You can use Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium to take your dataset beyond 1GB and avoid failures such as timeouts.  Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium documentation - https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-premium-incremental-refresh
